name: By Starlight
description:
"Come with me," he'd said. "Fly away with me, Errai."

Play as Prince Errai, a young lad grounded by his father, and traverse through your home to escape so you may meet with your darling dragon boyfriend Ophie.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fonts are by Typographer Mediengestaltung from 1001 Fonts

Music tracks:

Sneaky Suspicions by Panman Music

Sir Orkshield by Ean Grimm

Sound effects are from Sound Ideas
